com.pega.pegarules.pub.clipboard.mapping

Interface EntityMap


  • public interface EntityMap
    Map of clipboard entities to their corresponding data stream entities, e.g. JSON fields. Use the EntityMapBuilder to build individual entity metadata and then add to this map.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addMapping

        void addMapping(ClipboardEntity clipboardMetadata,
                DataStreamEntity dataStreamMetadata)
        Associate mapping between a clipboard property and a data stream field (e.g. JSON field)
        Parameters:
        clipboardMetadata -
        dataStreamMetadata -

      • addMapping

        void addMapping(ClipboardEntity clipboardMetadata,
                DataStreamEntity dataStreamMetadata,
                boolean autoMap)
        Associate mapping between a clipboard property and a data stream field (e.g. JSON field) and specify if the sub trees represented by these fields auto map. For example, a JSON object represented by dataStreamMetadata can be auto mapped to the clipboard page represented by clipboardMetadata.
        Parameters:
        clipboardMetadata -
        dataStreamMetadata -
        autoMap -

      • addUpdateContextMapping

        void addUpdateContextMapping(ClipboardEntity clipboardMetadata,
                             DataStreamEntity dataStreamMetadata)
        Associate mapping between a clipboard property and a data stream field and specify that it is an update context mapping.
        Parameters:
        clipboardMetadata -
        dataStreamMetadata -

      • getClipboardEntity

        ClipboardEntity getClipboardEntity(DataStreamEntity aEntity)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets the associated ClipboardEntity in the mapping, or null if none exists.
        Parameters:
        aEntity - the DataStreamEntity associated with the ClipboardEntity in the mapping
        Returns:
        the ClipboardEntity, or null if it is not in the mapping
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the DataStreamEntity is not of the correct child class

      • getDataStreamEntity

        DataStreamEntity getDataStreamEntity(ClipboardEntity aEntity)
        Gets the associated DataStreamEntity in the mapping, or null if none exists.
        Parameters:
        aEntity - the ClipboardEntity associated with the DataStreamEntity in the mapping
        Returns:
        the DataStreamEntity, or null if it is not in the mapping

      • skipProperty

        void skipProperty(java.lang.String aProperty)
        Adds the given property name to the skip list. Properties on this list will not be mapped even during automapping.
        Parameters:
        aProperty - - the name of the property to skip

      • removeSkippedProperty

        void removeSkippedProperty(java.lang.String aProperty)
        Removes the property name from the skip list. Properties on this list will not be mapped even during automapping.
        Parameters:
        aProperty - - the name of the property to not skip

      • createMultidimensionalArrays

        void createMultidimensionalArrays(boolean aValue)
        Specify whether PageList properties of PageList of SingleValue- pages should be serialized to a multidimensional array
        Parameters:
        aValue -

      • shouldCreateMultidimensionalArrays

        boolean shouldCreateMultidimensionalArrays()
        Should PageList properties of PageList of SingleValue- pages should be serialized to a multidimensional array
        Returns:
        whether or not multidimensional arrays will be created

      • convertPageListToScalarList

        void convertPageListToScalarList(ClipboardEntity clipboardMetadata,
                                 java.lang.String aValueProperty)
        Specify that a ClipboardProperty containing a PageList should be converted to a scalar array rather than an array of JSON objects. The values of the ClipboardProperty named aValueProperty will be taken from each page in the PageList and output to a single scalar array. Can also be used to denote a multidimensional array should be created out of a PageList of PageLists as arrays are themselves scalar elements - an array of arrays of scalars is still a scalar array
        Parameters:
        clipboardMetadata -
        aValueProperty -

      • setTopLevelPageListClass

        void setTopLevelPageListClass(java.lang.String className)
        Specify the class name of the page list property to which the top level JSON array needs to be mapped. This class name needs to be set only if the top level page list property's page class is not defined to be a definitive class, for example $CLASS or $ANY etc.
        Parameters:
        className -

      • getTopLevelPageListClass

        java.lang.String getTopLevelPageListClass()
        Returns the top level page list class set by setTopLevelPageListClass(java.lang.String)
        Returns:
        the top level page list class

      • addAppendAndMapToMapping

        void addAppendAndMapToMapping(ClipboardEntity clipboardContext,
                              DataStreamEntity dataStreamContext)

      • setConvertScalarArraysToValueLists

        void setConvertScalarArraysToValueLists(boolean value)
        Specifies whether parsed strings in JSON arrays should be converted to value list, instead of clipboard page list. Example: - input JSON: ["a", "b"] - parser tokens: START_ARRAY, VALUE_STRING, VALUE_STRING, END_ARRAY - result clipboard page.getJSON(): [ {"pyValue": "a", "pxObjClass": "SingleValue-Text"}, {"pyValue": "b", "pxObjClass": "SingleValue-Text"} ]
        Parameters:
        value -

      • getConvertScalarArraysToValueLists

        boolean getConvertScalarArraysToValueLists()
        Gets the state whether parsed strings in JSON arrays should be converted to value list, instead of clipboard page list. Default is false.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • getSchemaString

        java.lang.String getSchemaString()
        Gets the string value of the Avro Schema
        Returns:

      • putSchemaString

        void putSchemaString(java.lang.String schemaString)
        Sets the Avro Schema string value

      • getOutboundIterator

        java.util.Iterator<Mapping> getOutboundIterator()
        Returns:
        iterator having JSON DT mappings
